name: Willy Monfret

last_movies.title: Dieux du stade: Le making of du calendrier 2004

introduction: Willy Monfret is a French-Caribbean Model born and raised in Paris. He developed his DJ Skills traveling around the world, hitting runways and shooting for prestigious fashion brands such as Ralph Lauren, Azzaro, Benetton, and magazines such as Vogue, and even covers of GQ, Preference, Menʼs Health and many more. Willy is a House Music DJ whose influence comes from his origins: House with a French touch and Caribbean flavor in his Latin House mixes. His inspiration also comes from his numerous journeys across the globe, living in Hong Kong (China) and Cape Town (South Africa).He is currently based in New York City where heʼs earned his monthly residence at the notorious Greenhouse nightclub. In the United States Willy is already an icon, recognized by a tremendous female audience due to his modeling career and his lead role in the music video of world famous female rapper “Nicky Minaj”.
